headline: Assessing Franklin Resources (BEN) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Recent performance snapshot for Franklin Resources Franklin Resources (BEN) has caught investor attention after a recent share price move, with the stock last closing at $28.16 and posting a 1 day return of 1.73% and a 7 day return of 4.30%. Over the past month and past 3 months, the stock shows returns of 9.74% and 22.17%. headline: Morgan Stanley Raises Franklin Resources (BEN) Target to $22, Keeps Underweight Rating
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is included among the Dividend Champions, Contenders, and Challengers List: 15 Highest Yielding Stocks. On February 3, Morgan Stanley raised its price recommendation on Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) to $22 from $21. It kept an Underweight rating on the stock and trimmed its calendar Q4 adjusted EPS estimate by 14%, pointing […]
